# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a textual context.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a textual context with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates a textual context with the specified raw value.
